name: The Night at The Tavern
description:
It all takes place in a medieval, fictional world of Vudos. A world run by the art of necromancy and alchemy in a medieval inspired environment.

A lot can happen in a night, why not spend it with a captivating, fellow traveler at a tavern? What drinks would you order? How will you pass the time? What will the two of you do after? Find out!

Each of the three exclusive endings are accompanied by their own illustrations and choices, can you uncover them all?
